attributes.action: Prevent Newspapers Preaching Racial Hatred amounting to a virtual Facsist Doctrine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apply censorship laws to prevent certain daily tabloid newspapers from preaching a xenophobic, proto-facist stance to the general public and to prevent them from encouraging "witch-hunts" against Muslims, Europeans - in fact anyone who doesn't have a white skin and speak English as a first language.  Their stance will only increased racial tension and attacks on minority communisites in this country.
